summary: ENB preset for NLA plugin and ELFX Interiors
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/XUpsr7x.png[/img]
I want to thank you all for your support. I know this isn't too much on a global scale for some people, but it really means a lot to me if I could make you feel happy with this. And I'm very happy that you are so kind to me. [/center]
[center][youtube]fc_G94r3fiM[/youtube]
[youtube]bOrgAdA5g0g[/youtube]
Blue Rose
A symbol of love, prosperity and immortality.
Sanguine's Exquisite.

[size=5][b]Requirements:[/b]
[b]Latest v0.319 ENB binary files (d3d9.dll and enbhost) from [/b][b][url=http://enbdev.com/]enbdev[/url]. 
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065/]NLA[/url]﻿ esp plugin.
[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?][b]Enhanced Lights And FX (Main and Enhancer)[/b]
[/url][/size]
[b][size=3]Any other mods editing dungeon/interior lighting or weathers are [u]incompatible![/u][/size]
[/b][size=5][b]Installation: [/b][/size]
drop files into your skyrim folder and configure VideoMemorySizeMb in enblocal. 
Edit your skyrimprefs like this:
[Display]
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1 
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
iMultiSample=0 
iMaxAnisotropy=0
[b][size=4]And don't forget to disable Steam Overlay in game's options of your Steam library. [/size]
[size=5]
Other Recommended Mods:[/size][/b][b][size=5]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]Realistic Water Two
[/url][/size][/b][b][size=5]HD Textures of your choice
[/size][/b][b][size=5]For a Skybox I'd recommend Kyo's sky textures from [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58338/?]here[/url][size=5].[/size]
[size=5]And possibly [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59809]Vivid Clouds[/url][size=5]﻿.[/size]
[b][size=4]For the best experience with the rainy visuals of this preset force permanent weather via console:
"FW 8c220 1"
Sadly I do not know yet how to apply one type of weather to every existing world/cell via esp. Especially mods that are in development like Glenmoril.[/size][/b]
[size=5]Credits[/size]
[/b]Boris Vorontsov for ENB Series.
SweetFX by CeeJay, TV shaders by Boulotaur2024.
Kingeric1992 for DOF.
magica2 for wet surface settings when it rains.
mobiusbelmont for inspiration and idea. 
effect by Miratheus.
ENB Lut by Cantregisterlol. 
I hope I didn't forget anyone, please don't hurt me. Actually, if I did - let me know. [/center]
author: Hawkscr1mer
